name: poenskelisten
description: Poenskelisten is a simple self-hosted wishlist app for organizing and sharing gift ideas with others. It includes sorting, sharing links, and a minimal UI for personal use.
features: Wishlist creation: Create and manage personal wishlists for gifts and desired items.
Item details: Add product names, descriptions, links, and prices to wishlist items.
Sharing links: Generate shareable links to let others view your wishlist.
Priority sorting: Mark items with priority levels to indicate most wanted gifts.
Claim tracking: Allow others to mark items as claimed to avoid duplicate gifts.
Multiple lists: Create separate wishlists for different occasions or categories.
User accounts: Manage individual accounts for family members with separate wishlists.
Privacy controls: Set wishlists as public or private to control visibility.
Image uploads: Add product images to wishlist items for visual reference.
Price tracking: Monitor item prices and get notified of price changes.
Notes and comments: Add personal notes or let others leave comments on items.
Mobile responsive: Access and manage wishlists from any device with optimized interface.
